Xiamen Bright Showers Co., Ltd. is located in Xiamen of PRC. We are mainly specialized in shower products. Since 2006, Bright Showers has established good ODM/OEM cooperation with some brand companies in Europe, North America, and Australia. We attained ISO9001:2000 Certification in 2008.
